content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) to transfer items from the chest to the furnace

### Coal Mining Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for smelting iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) to transfer items from the chest to the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors such as "Could not insert: No iron-ore to insert from your inventory."

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly check and empty chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full chests. This will ensure continuous operation and resource collection.
